film.title: Howling II: Your Sister is a Werewolf
film.summary: A man discovers that his sister was a werewolf, and helps an investigator track down a gang of the monsters through the United States and eastern Europe.

guestOne.name: Tig Notaro
guestOne.bio: Tig Notaro is the host of Professor Blastoff, as well as one of our most popular Comedy Bang Bang guests. As a stand-up comedian Tig has performed in comedy clubs all across the country, a surprising number of living rooms, and Premium Blend. Her monthly Largo show Tig Has Friends is a stalwart of the Los Angeles comedy scene. Her first ever album is due out on August 2nd through Secretly Canadian Records. Listen to Tig on Professor Blastoff every Tuesday on Earwolf!

plugs.title: Tig Notaro Happy To Be Here

guestTwo.name: Stephanie Allynne
guestTwo.bio: Stephanie Allynne performs regularly at UCB-LA with Last Day of School Text Message Show and ASSSSCAT. She can also be seen in In A World, Gregory Go Boom (Sundance 2014), KIT (Sundance 2013) The League, The Mindy Project, Maron, 2 Broke Girls, Kroll Show, Key & Peele, Comedy Bang! Bang!, Birthday Boys, and in Matt Besserâ€™s webseries The Master Class.

results.episodeDescription: Tig Notaro and Stephanie Allynne (One Mississippi) join Paul and Jason to discuss the 1985 horror film Howling II: Your Sister Is a Werewolf. Recorded live from The 9th Annual Bentzen Ball Comedy Festival in Washington D.C., they talk about Christopher Lee in space, monkey costumes in place of werewolf costumes, awful werewolf orgies, and much more insanity.
